inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let threshold = 0.99;
AzureDiagnostics
| where url_s matches regex "/transactions-service/transactions"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total

| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
let threshold = 0.99;
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "updateTransactionAuthorization"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total

| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "/transactions-service/transactions";
AzureDiagnostics
| where url_s matches regex api_url
| extend HTTPStatus = case(
  responseCode_d between (100 .. 199), "1XX",
  responseCode_d between (200 .. 299), "2XX",
  responseCode_d between (300 .. 399), "3XX",
  responseCode_d between (400 .. 499), "4XX",
  "5XX")
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "updateTransactionAuthorization"
| extend HTTPStatus = tostring(toint(responseCode_d))
| summarize count() by HTTPStatus, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| render areachart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "count")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let threshold = 1;
AzureDiagnostics
| where url_s matches regex "/transactions-service/transactions"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(DurationMs, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)

| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "response time(s)")

content.Query:
let threshold = 500;
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "updateTransactionAuthorization"
| summarize
    watermark=threshold,
    duration_percentile_95=percentiles(DurationMs, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)

content.Query:
let threshold = 0.99;
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "CallbackOutcome"
  and url_s startswith "https://api.platform.pagopa.it/ecommerce/redirect/v1/redirections/"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let threshold = 0.99;
AzureDiagnostics
| where url_s matches regex "/transactions-service/transactions/[^/]+"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total

| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
let threshold = 0.99;
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "addUserReceipt" and url_s contains "clientId=ecomm"
| summarize
  Total=count(),
  Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total

| project TimeGenerated, availability, watermark=threshold
| render timechart with (xtitle = "time", ytitle= "availability(%)")

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ( operationId_s == "updateTransactionAuthorization") and responseCode_d != 200
| project base64TransactionId = split(url_s,"/")[7], TimeGenerated, url_s,backendResponseCode_d,responseCode_d

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where operationId_s == "addUserReceipt" and url_s contains "clientId=ecomm" and responseCode_d != 200
| project txId = split(url_s,"/")[7], TimeGenerated, url_s,responseCode_d

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let api_url = "/transactions-service/transactions/[^/]+";
AzureDiagnostics
| where url_s matches regex api_url

content.Query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ( operationId_s == "updateTransactionAuthorization") and (responseCode_d == 0 or responseCode_d >= 500)
| project base64TransactionId = split(url_s,"/")[7], TimeGenerated,responseCode_d, DurationMs
content.PartTitle: request update error to manually check (timeout & 5xx) - updateTransactionAuthorization
